name: Trebuchet Rivalry
description:
Trebuchet rivalry is a first person multiplayer turn-based strategy game, placed on top of the tallest building in your city is a trebuchet, you will have to place the rest your buildings to complete your city and use your beloved trebuchet to destroy all of your opponent's buildings to win the game. You can walk around on the rooftop of your main building, up there you will have a flag that will tell you the strength and direction of the wind, a monitor that will reveal which buildings are destroyed and of course a trebuchet that you will be able to fire at your opponent's buildings. 

The game will start off with a building phase, you can fly around your half of the level and place a total of 8 buildings. Once that's done it will turn into a turn based game, you have one shot per turn so you don’t want to be wasteful. Pay attention to the wind direction, strength and adjust the trebuchets counter weight to make sure you will hit your shots.

With a theme of physics Trebuchet rivalry was made in 4 weeks + 2 weeks of prototyping using UE5 during one of Futuregames game projects.
